siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt:

of the command, splitting raw output intoâ€¦
markdownRemark.html: Data sources define data input to Trafikito service. Data sources are made of command alias on your server, the output of the command, splitting raw output into a table and variables representing individual numbers or strings of the output. Every minute new output is sent to Trafikito using the agent installed on your server.

frontmatter.title: What are chips in the data source list?
